content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
This bundle includes the Full game, and Season Pass.

Also included is a 30 day PlayStation Now Rental for GRID 2. To redeem the PlayStation Now rental you must navigate to the PlayStation Now store after purchasing the GRID Autosport Complete Bundle.

Experience an intense, authentic and deep world of professional motorsport - specialise in your favorite racing style or conquer them all across 100 routes at 22 incredible locations. GRID Autosport features a huge career, the return of in-car view & the most exciting high-performance racing cars. Extensive multiplayer options include Racing Clubs for online team competition, weekly challenges powered by RaceNet & 2 player split-screen racing.

1-2 players
742KB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-12

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
